     other two (2) social science subjects at not more than two (2) 
sittings.  
    (vii)  LASU  
    (a)  For Accounting requires other two (2) relevant subjects, it 
could be from any of Principles of Account, Commerce, Office 
Practice and Secretarial duties.  
    (b)    For Public Administration requires 'O' level credit passes to 
include English Language, Mathematics, Government, 
Economics and any one (1) of Principles of Accounts, 
Commerce, Office Practice and Secretariat Studies.  
    (c)      For Business Administration requires five (5) 'O' level credit 
passes including English Language, Mathematics plus any 
three (3) of Economics, Accounting, Commerce, Government 
and Geography.  
    (d)   For Insurance requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes including 
English Language,  Mathematics, Economics plus any two (2) 
of Accounting,  Business Method, Commerce, Government, 
Geography and Statistics.  
    (e)  For Marketing, it requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes 
including English Language,  Mathematics, Economics plus 
any three (3) of Business Method, Commerce, Book Keeping 
and Economics.  
(viii) COVENANT:  
a. For Accounting requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes to include 
English Language, Mathematics, Economics , one (1) science 
subject from the  following: Biology, Health/ General Science,  
Agricultural Science, Physics and Chemistry and either of 
Geography, Government, Accounting, Book Keeping and 
Commerce.  
b. For Marketing: requires 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Economics one of Government or 
History  and any Science subject from Biology, Health/General 
Science, Agricultural Science, Physics and Chemistry.  
(ix) UNIOSUN requires   
(a)      For Accounting: five (5) 'O' level credit passes at not more 
than two (2) sittings in subjects which must include English 
Language, Mathematics and Economics to form the core 
subjects and in any of the following: Geography,  Government 
and Accounting at one sitting.
